items.summary: Refactor the CertificationsGallery component to organize all 54 certification images in a structured grid layout with consistent spacing, alignment, and uniform card dimensions

Implement a responsive grid system for the CertificationsGallery that displays 1 column on mobile (sm), 2 columns on tablet (md), 3 columns on larger tablets (lg), and 4 columns on desktop (xl) screens
Apply consistent styling to each certification card in the grid including aspect ratio preservation, border radius, shadow effects, and background color matching the portfolio's design system
